title: Startup Accelerator Intern
description: Support early-stage startups with business development and mentorship coordination. Assist in organizing startup events and pitch competitions. Learn about venture capital processes and help evaluate investment opportunities.

title: Venture Capital Intern
description: Support due diligence processes for startup investments and portfolio company management. Assist in market research and competitive analysis for investment decisions. Learn about term sheet negotiations and startup valuation methods.

title: Startup Operations Intern
description: Support day-to-day operations of early-stage startups including administrative and operational activities. Assist in business process documentation and system implementations. Learn about scaling challenges and growth strategies.

title: Business Incubation Intern
description: Support startup mentorship programs and entrepreneurship development activities. Assist in organizing pitch events and demo days for startups. Learn about business model validation and go-to-market strategies.

title: Innovation Management Intern
description: Support corporate innovation programs and internal startup initiatives. Assist in idea generation workshops and innovation challenge management. Learn about design thinking and lean startup methodologies.

title: Social Entrepreneurship Intern
description: Work with social enterprises on sustainable business models that address social challenges. Support impact measurement and stakeholder engagement activities. Learn about blended finance and social impact investing.
